title: When you're not blind anymore and you see your gf for the first time in years.

Thanks, I'm  a man of culture.
I don't get it

Right hand = gf.

Why have a gf when you just need your right hand to satisfy your needs ;)

isnt that his lefty tho?

hope the right hand isnt the jealous type
It is, I just didn't bother mention his left hand because the gf joke is used with the right one.
Tbh i don't see what is it with fisting. I imagine it's both disturbing and painful, especially from the rear end.
It's not a reference to fisting...
I don't understand then. I don't think most people "do it" with their left hands..
I think the joke includes that Lee is left-handed.
Hm. Kinda unrelatable but okay then.
